articles.title: Shinzo Abe, Japan's former prime minister, assassinated at a campaign stop
articles.description: Former Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, Japan's longest-serving leader, died on Friday hours after he was shot while campaigning for a parliamentary election, shocking a country in which political violence is rare and guns are tightly controlled.

articles.author: Taylor Romine
articles.title: Fire threatens Yosemite's Mariposa Grove, home to more than 500 giant sequoia trees
articles.description: A wildfire is threatening a famed giant sequoia tree grove in California's Yosemite National Park, officials said Thursday.
articles.content: A wildfire is threatening a famed giant sequoia tree grove in California's Yosemite National Park, officials said Thursday.
